SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_DEL_FL, MEMBER_AUTH FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO > 0
AND MEMBER_AUTH = 1
AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'Y'
AND MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchQuery} || '%'
AND LOWER(MEMBER_EMAIL) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchQuery} || '%')
AND LOWER(MEMBER_NAME) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{searchQuery} || '%')
ORDER BY MEMBER_NO ASC

SELECT CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_AUTH IN (0, 2)) AS VARCHAR2(4)) AS "activeMember", CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER") AS VARCHAR2(4)) AS "totalMember", CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_AUTH = 1) AS VARCHAR2(4)) AS "blockMember", CAST((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N') AS VARCHAR2(4)) AS "secessionMember" FROM DUAL
